com.gmail.mordress.epamproject.services.ifaces

Interface UserService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserServiceImpl

    public interface UserService
extends Service
    Provides operations for user-interaction with dao-layer.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Alexey Kardychko

       throws PersistentException

        login - user's login.
        password - user's password.

        User instances.

        boolean checkUniqueLogin(java.lang.String login)
                  throws PersistentException
        Check for exists some login.
        Parameters:
        login - - user's login.
        Returns:
        Boolean value, true if that login NOT currently exist in db.

        PersistentException - - if dao-layer can't successful complete this operation.
